text: Area codes 876 and 658 are telephone area codes in the North American Numbering Plan that cover Jamaica, including major cities like Kingston, Montego Bay, and Spanish Town. Area code 876 entered service as a 1997 as a split from area code 809, which originally covered the entire Caribbean region. As the demand for phone numbers grew, area code 658 overlaid 876 on April 30, 2019. Category:Area codes
title: Area codes 876 and 658
